HEADER.TITLE: FINKI-HUB
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: The unofficial student platform for the Faculty of Computer Science and Engineering (FINKI) in Skopje. Your ultimate resource for academic success.

OFFER_SECTION.TITLE: What We Offer
OFFER_SECTION.FEATURE_1_DESCRIPTION: Access a curated collection of links to official and unofficial study materials, lecture notes, and past exams. Stop searching and start learning.
OFFER_SECTION.FEATURE_2_DESCRIPTION: Learn about academic departments, research labs, and faculty members. Find opportunities to get involved and expand your knowledge beyond the classroom.
OFFER_SECTION.FEATURE_3_DESCRIPTION: Join our unofficial Discord server to connect with peers, collaborate on projects, and get real-time help from a supportive community.

GITHUB_SECTION.TITLE: Join Our Open-Source Community
GITHUB_SECTION.DESCRIPTION: Help us build and improve FINKI-HUB! Contribute to our open-source project on GitHub, report bugs, or suggest new features. Every contribution helps!

FAQ_SECTION.TITLE: FAQs
FAQ_SECTION.Q1_ANSWER: FINKI-HUB is an unofficial, student-run platform designed to help students at the Faculty of Computer Science and Engineering (FINKI) in Skopje. It provides a central hub for study materials, faculty information, and a community for students.
FAQ_SECTION.Q2_SUMMARY: Is FINKI-HUB affiliated with the official FINKI faculty?
FAQ_SECTION.Q2_ANSWER: No, FINKI-HUB is not officially affiliated with the FINKI faculty. It is an independent platform created by students, for students, to supplement official resources.
FAQ_SECTION.Q3_SUMMARY: How can I contribute to the platform?
FAQ_SECTION.Q3_ANSWER: You can contribute by joining our Discord server and sharing resources. We're always looking for new ways to improve the platform!
